text: Lophopetalum sessilifolium is a species of plant in the family Celastraceae. It is a tree endemic to Borneo where it is confined to Sarawak. ==References== sessilifolium Category:Endemic flora of Borneo Category:Flora of Sarawak Category:Trees of Borneo Category:Vulnerable flora of Asia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lophopetalum sessilifolium
